rewrite1:
For the seventh paragraph, please set the line spacing to single and add a 1 cm space before the text begins. Change the font to Microsoft JhengHei and alter the text color to the hexadecimal code #FAFAD2.

Regarding the fifth paragraph, adjust the line spacing to be multiple, equivalent to 3 lines, and ensure there's no additional space after the paragraph. Apply a dotted underline to the text, and make sure the italic style is turned off.
rewrite2:

Moving on to the fifth paragraph, adjust the line spacing to Multiple with a setting of 3 lines. Ensure there is no extra space following the paragraph. Apply a dotted underline for emphasis, and make sure the italic style is turned off."
rewrite3:
Revised instructions:
